author: andschwa
body: this issue had the original title  Fix Pester mocks . Not sure why, but the goal seemed to be running an PowerShell Runspace from an xunit test, which is a good thing by itself anyway, so the title was renamed to reflect this.    \* Blocking #174  Implement snapins for System.Management.Automation.Runspaces  using System.Management.Automation.Runspaces;  public static class test         Fact       public static voud TestMethod                   Runspace rs = RunspaceFctory.CreateRunspace  ;          Currently, the above code creates the following error when running make test  also attached     VSO create date - 8/10/2015 16:25:00     VSO closed date - 9/3/2015 14:04:00
title: start Runspace from xunit test
